content:
motorno olje za 1.6dci 96kw za nissan qashqai 11/2011
ali je tole motorno olje primerno Elf Evolution 900 SXR 5W-30
ali Elf Evolution Fulltech FE 5W-30
namesto original Nissan Original DPF 5W-30
author: joshyslo

content:
Kot vidim na Elf uradni strani SXR ni za dpf...fulltech FE je! 

http://catalog.elf.com/en/products/but/EVOLUTION-900-SXR-5W-30

http://catalog.elf.com/en/products/buz/EVOLUTION-FULL-TECH-FE-5W-30

Poglej pod norms&homologations

Pazi na dpf kompatibilnost!
author: Kamele0N

content:
potemtakem se sploh nesme  uporabit EVOLUTION-FULL-TECH-FE-5W-30 

kake so lahko težave
author: joshyslo

content:
Uporabnik joshyslo je napisal:
			
		
	
	
		
		
			potemtakem se sploh nesme  uporabit EVOLUTION-FULL-TECH-FE-5W-30

kake so lahko težave
		
		Klikni za razširitev
	
Težave imaš ti z razumevanjem 

Saj ti piše Acea level C3....C4
https://www.oilspecifications.org/acea.php

ACEA C3 Stable, stay-in-grade Engine Oil with Mid SAPS-Level, intended for use as catalyst compatible Oil at extended Drain Intervals in Vehicles with all Types of modern Aftertreatment Systems and High Performance Passenger Car & Light Duty Van Gasoline & DI Diesel Engines that are designed to be capable of using Oils with a minimum HTHS Viscosity of 3.5 mPa*s.
ACEA C4 Stable, stay-in-grade Engine Oil with Low SAPS-Level, intended for use as catalyst compatible Oil at extended Drain Intervals in Vehicles with all Types of modern Aftertreatment Systems and High Performance Passenger Car & Light Duty Van Gasoline & DI Diesel Engines that are designed to be capable of using Oils with a minimum HTHS Viscosity of 3.5 mPa*s.

https://www.oilspecifications.org/mercedes_mb.php
MB 226.51This specification is based on RN0720 and is recommended for Mercedes vehicles with DPF fitted diesel engines supplied by Renault. Oils meeting this specification have very good thermal stability and aftertreatment compatibility.
author: Kamele0N

content:

https://www.oilspecifications.org/acea.php

ACEA C3 Stable, stay-in-grade Engine Oil with Mid SAPS-Level, intended for use as catalyst compatible Oil at extended Drain Intervals in Vehicles with all Types of modern Aftertreatment Systems and High Performance Passenger Car & Light Duty Van Gasoline & DI Diesel Engines that are designed to be capable of using Oils with a minimum HTHS Viscosity of 3.5 mPa*s.
ACEA C4 Stable, stay-in-grade Engine Oil with Low SAPS-Level, intended for use as catalyst compatible Oil at extended Drain Intervals in Vehicles with all Types of modern Aftertreatment Systems and High Performance Passenger Car & Light Duty Van Gasoline & DI Diesel Engines that are designed to be capable of using Oils with a minimum HTHS Viscosity of 3.5 mPa*s.

https://www.oilspecifications.org/mercedes_mb.php
MB 226.51This specification is based on RN0720 and is recommended for Mercedes vehicles with DPF fitted diesel engines supplied by Renault. Oils meeting this specification have very good thermal stability and aftertreatment compatibility.
		
		Klikni za razširitev
	


narobe napisal   mislil napisat da za tole olje Elf Evolution 900 SXR 5W-30 ni primerno ne full tech
author: joshyslo

content:
Očitno Nissanovo olje dela Total za Nissan....

http://www4.total.fr/asia-oceania/a...Genuine Oil 5W30 C4 DPF TDS 20161110 v1-0.pdf

Specifikacije pa bolj splošne od teh na Elf Fulltech.... API SM Acea C4...pač splošni specifikaciji za MID/LOW SAPS olje (SM je za bencinske motorje...C4 je LOW saps za dizelske)

Moraš razumet da sicer so OEM specifikacije kot BMW LL-04 MB 229.51 ali 226.51 VW 504/507 izpeljanke iz API SM / ACEA Cx

AMPAK!!!!

Izpeljanke + da dodajo nekatere dodatne OEM pogoje!

Se pravi v Nissana z DPF lahko naliješ katerokoli olje z zgoraj omenjenimi specifikacijami....od BMW, MB, VW.....vsa bodo ščitila tvoj motor in DPF....stem da so naktera boljša

Če spremljaš avtoforume....vse gravitira k temu da...

VW 504/507 norma je najbolj rigolozna......najmočnejša

potem MB norme

Potem BMW....

Ostali jim pa sledijo
author: Kamele0N

content:
Tukaj imaš orodje za primerjavo standardov v "pajčnem diagramu" (mislim da se tako reče

Primerjaj med sabo VW MB BMW ACEA API......in ti bo jasno kaj in kje ma kateri standard bolj zaostreno....večja kot je številka boljše je olje na tistem področju

https://www.lubrizol.com/Lubricant-...-Oil-Additives/ACEA/Relative-Performance-Tool
author: Kamele0N

content: sprašujem ker se ne razumem na tole katero je primerno ker za Elf Evolution 900 SXR 5W-30 nisem zaseldil da bi bilo primerno namesto Nissan Original DPF 5W-30  ker ni ista specifikacija.

author: Roberto

content:
Ja samo to je tko kot če bi primerjali VAG grupo al pa Kia/Hyundai... Je "isti" koncern ampak 5w40 od ELFa ni identičen 5w40 od Totala.... 

Če najdeš kje VOA/UOA analize teh dveh znamk in primerjaš olja niso čisto enaka med istim rangom...
author: Kamele0N

content: Kje je for a? Proizvajalec avtomobila priporoca olje Shell klasifikacije A5B5  0w20. Gres pod Shell toll pa pise da je priporocljivo olje 5w40 za omenjeni tip avtomobila.  Kdo koga zeza?
author: irwin

content:
Zezajo nas okoljevarstveniki ki za 0,02476 dcl manjšo porabo predpišejo 0w20 mastno vodo... 

Poglej kaj je identičen motor rabil kak fejlift al pa 2 nazaj ko se še ni kompliciralo pa tist nalij
author: Kamele0N

content: volk sit koza cela 5w30 z ustreznimi specifikacijami in jasno ceno zraven gledal. pa klasika menjavo na 10k z filtrom vred. nima kaj zajeba bit.
